subject: Soccer
UEFA Champions League (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: Cristiano Ronaldo and Lionel Messi scored goals in bunches as Real Madrid stayed 1 point ahead of Barcelona on top of the Spanish league at the season’s halfway point.
snippet: Cristiano Ronaldo and Lionel Messi scored goals in bunches as Real Madrid stayed 1 point ahead of Barcelona on top of the Spanish league at the season’s halfway point.
